product_name: DeLorme Texas Atlas and Gazetteer - Revised
long_description: An atlas and gazetteer with detailed topographic maps of the entire state of Texas. Softcover; 168 pages; plus detailed street maps of over 100 cities and towns. Delorme; copyright 2000. Covers all publicly owned lands as well as ramps/docks, campgrounds, fishing, hunting and hiking areas; tips on estimating mileage while on trips. Also includes historic sites/museums, information centers, national forests, scenic drives and unique natural features.
short_description: An atlas and gazetteer with detailed topographic maps of the entire state of Texas.
